root: ^As you can see, this is an enormous island. Many places to start your adventure.
^However, there is one very special place. We call it Heart of Island.
^Maybe it is better to show you. Then you understand the meaning of it.
^Meet me there. Use the map, so you won’t get lost.
^As you journey through the forest, keep an eye out for berry bushes.
^Berries grow all across the island, if you want you can try and collect them all!
